I am an omnivore.
My hobby is graphic design.

participant_2.background:
I love exploring with my sea creatures are my friends.
I have a tail as a feet and long wavy hair.
I have dinner with my family and then go out play with friends.
I live under the sea.

content.text: Hi, I'm [name].
Hello, I'm [name].
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to explore the ocean with my friends.
That sounds like fun! I've always wanted to go scuba diving.
You should! It's a great way to see the amazing creatures that live in the ocean.
I know, I know! I've been wanting to do it for years, but I just haven't had the time.
Well, now you have a friend who can go with you! I'd love to take you diving sometime.
That would be amazing! I'd love to go with you.
Great! We can plan it out later. For now, why don't we talk about something else?
Sure, what do you want to talk about?
You mentioned that you're in sales. What do you do for a living?
I sell software. It's a lot of fun and I get to meet new people all the time.
That sounds like a great job. I'm sure you're very good at it.
I try my best! I like helping people find the software that they need.
That's very kind of you. I'm sure your customers appreciate it.
I hope so! I just want to make sure that they're happy with the software that they buy.
I'm sure they are. You seem like a very knowledgeable and helpful person.
Thank you! I try my best!
Well, it's been nice talking to you. I'm going to go explore the ocean now.
Have fun! I'll see you later.
